thread.title: Hotel in Manhattan centrally located near Central Park and Times Square!
thread.title_full: Hotel in Manhattan centrally located near Central Park and Times Square! - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mslivick
title: Hotel in Manhattan centrally located near Central Park and Times Square!
text:
I stay at the Wellington Hotel every spring for a long weekend. Doormen are exceptional with baggage and taxi requests. Rooms are nice and the Park Cafe at the hotel is delicious, inexpensive and fast service. The shakes are quite tasty after an evening theatre performance. Go for a higher level room as the street sounds can be disturbing, but the views are worth the elevator ride! Great place to stay.
Room Tip: higher levels provide excellent views, lower levels hear street sounds See more room tips
